thread.title: Holly Willoughby and her daughter are like two peas in a pod – see their adorable twinning photo
thread.title_full: Holly Willoughby and her daughter are like two peas in a pod – see their adorable twinning photo

title: Holly Willoughby and her daughter are like two peas in a pod – see their adorable twinning photo
text:
Search Holly Willoughby and her daughter are like two peas in a pod – see their adorable twinning photo February 26, 2017 by Hanna Fillingham Holly Willoughby took to Instagram on Sunday to show a sweet photo of her and daughter, Belle dressed up in matching tonal shades. The This Morning presenter has definitely got a mini fashionista in her family - see the picture here.. Leave a comment 
Holly Willoughby is known for her impeccable dress sense, and it looks like her young daughter, Belle is following in her footsteps. Taking to Instagram on Sunday, the popular This Morning host shared an adorable picture of her and Belle’s “tonal twinning”, with the sweet duo both dressed in pastel pink shades. While Holly looks glam in a pleated skirt and dusty pink stilettos, Belle shows her love for all things floral in a printed skirt, teamed with the sweetest pair of miniature gold pumps dusted in glitter – aww! Fans were keen to know where the stylish presenter bought her outfit from, with one asking: “Love your shoes Holly. Please share details”, while another said: “I love your skirt/dress? Where is it from?” VIEW GALLERY Belle's dress was even popular with the family cat, Bluebell 
Holly also shared a photo of the back of Belle’s dress, captioned: “Styling by Bluebell”, with the image showing the Willougby family’s new cat, Bluebell sweetly latching onto the bow. Holly, who also has two other children with her husband, Dan Baldwin – Harry and Chester, is fiercely protective of her children’s privacy, but often shares sweet glimpses into her family life. The doting mum uploaded a cute video of her youngest son, Chester , two, earlier in the week, where the little boy can be heard naming the characters of Paw Patrol as Holly points to them – recalling every one without fail! 
GALLERY: Holly Willoughby's Instagram fashion diary 
Recently, Holly opened up about motherhood in an exclusive HELLO! interview, revealing "All I ever wanted to do was to be a mum. It wasn’t like when I was at school I thought, 'Oh, I’m going to be this big career girl'. Being a mummy is definitely my most favourite job of all, without a shadow of a doubt." She also spoke about how she juggled a hectic career while raising three children, saying: "I have the same issues as the next person, but I do feel very lucky that I’ve been blessed with three lovely children and that I look forward to going to work, because I know a lot of people don’t feel like that. If I’m going to get up and leave the kids in the morning then it has to be for something that I care about, or feel passionately about – and I’m lucky to be able to do that."
